mapper.select: select ch.title, ch.start_date, ch.end_date, c.name AS categoryName from challenge as ch inner join category as c on ch.category_id = c.id where ch.start_date between current_date() AND current_date() + interval (7 - dayofweek(curdate())) day order by ch.start_date asc
SELECT id AS challengeId, title, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate FROM Challenge WHERE start_date = #{startDate}
SELECT id AS challengeId, title, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate FROM Challenge WHERE end_date = #{endDate}
SELECT user_id FROM ChallengeParticipation WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId} AND status = 'PARTICIPATING'
